quote: I touched his face. ""Look,"" I said. ""I love you more than everything else in the world combined. Isn't that enough?"" ""Yes, it is enough,"" he answered, smiling. ""Enough for forever.
quote_letters: I TOUCHED HIS FACE LOOK I SAID I LOVE YOU MORE THAN EVERYTHING ELSE IN THE WORLD COMBINED ISNT THAT ENOUGH YES IT IS ENOUGH HE ANSWERED SMILING ENOUGH FOR FOREVER
